name: Watch the Boxes
description:
Welcome!

Hello, Employee! Happy to have you here in "Your Friendly Corp" Inc. Our HR department thougthfully developed this briefing to help new workers adapt so read carefully.

Where am I?

You are  a new employee of "Your friendly Corp" Inc. This means you are responsible for keeping our main pipeline in check. To achieve this several things must be done.

Such as?

1) You need to remove all boxes wich fail to pass our QA test. Our company refuses to provide anything less than perfect!

2) You need to keep pipeline clear from obstacles so that boxes can move freely. We can afford no delays, Employee!

OK, so what do I get from this?

You get a fun mobile game experience with fast-paced challenging gameplay and 15 energizing soundtracks to unlock. Sounds good? Let's get started then!

And if smth goes wrong?

Don't worry, we at YFC got you covered. In case you find bugs contact our HR manger at rdtabear@gmail.com. You can also send suggestions and comments.
